name: InsertClosedStatus
query:
INSERT INTO public.task_header_status
(id, task_header_id, status, notes, 
created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by)
VALUES('{{ msg.uuid }}', '{{ msg.req.body.task_header_id}}', 'CLOSED', 'APPROVE',
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '{{ msg.req.body.user_id }}', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, '{{ msg.req.body.user_id }}');

name: GetDocRevID
query:
SELECT id 
FROM document_revision dr 
WHERE document_content_header_id = (
    SELECT content_id 
    FROM task_header th 
    WHERE id = '{{ msg.req.body.task_header_id }}')
ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1

name: GetTaskDetailStatus
query:
SELECT t.*, ts.notes, ts.status
FROM task_detail t
JOIN (
  SELECT task_detail_id, notes, status
  FROM task_detail_status
  WHERE task_detail_id = '{{ msg.req.body.task_detail_id }}'
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
) ts ON ts.task_detail_id = t.id;

name: GetTaskDetailStatus
query:
SELECT t.*, ts.notes, ts.status, ts.created_by as owned_by
FROM task_detail t
JOIN (
  SELECT task_detail_id, notes, status, created_by
  FROM task_detail_status
  WHERE task_detail_id = '{{ msg.req.body.task_detail_id }}'
  ORDER BY created_at DESC
  LIMIT 1
) ts ON ts.task_detail_id = t.id;

name: GetAllTaskDetail
query:
SELECT CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS(
  SELECT 1 FROM task_detail t LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (task_detail_id) task_detail_id, status 
    FROM task_detail_status ORDER BY task_detail_id, created_at DESC) s
  ON s.task_detail_id = t.id
  WHERE t.task_header_id = '{{ msg.req.body.task_header_id }}'
  AND s.status <> 'CLOSED')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_all_detail_closed;

query:
SELECT t.*, ts.notes, ts.status
FROM task_header t
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT DISTINCT ON (task_header_id) task_header_id, notes, status
  FROM task_header_status

) ts ON ts.task_header_id = t.id

query:

  ORDER BY created_at DESC

name: GetAllChildTask
query:
SELECT CASE WHEN NOT EXISTS(
  SELECT 1 FROM task_detail t LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT ON (task_detail_id) task_detail_id, status 
    FROM task_detail_status ORDER BY task_detail_id, created_at DESC) s
  ON s.task_detail_id = t.id
  WHERE t.task_parent_id = '{{ msg.taskparent.id }}'
  AND s.status <> 'CLOSED')
THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_all_child_closed;

FROM pg_stat_activity 
WHERE usename = 'nodered'
AND state = 'idle'
AND pid <> pg_backend_pid();
